title: Seated Forward Bend
description: Sit with your legs stretched in front of you. Bring your feet to touch. Reach your arms toward the sky with an inhale. Bend forward from your hips with an exhale and hold your shins, ankles, or toes. Relax your neck. Breathe deeply into your belly. Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Keep neck in line with spine Keep feet together and relaxed Breathe deeply into belly and back Avoid this pose if you have asthma or a back injury.
